item.description:
YOU’RE INVITED!
=========================
Foodshare Annual Meeting
Thursday, March 19, 2009
5:00–7:00 p.m. open house & refreshments / 5:45 p.m. program
450 Woodland Avenue, Bloomfield


For 25 years, Gloria McAdam has led Foodshare with vision and passion. In 2008, under her leadership, Foodshare distributed a record 11,067,867 pounds of food forour hungry neighbors in need.

Please join donors, volunteers, partner agencies and anti-hunger friends for a brief program of special recognition for Gloria’s dedicated service and devotion to the cause of ending hunger in our region.

RSVP by Friday, March 13
Contact Yvonne Bowen at (860) 286-9999 x115
or by email at ybowen@foodshare.org

See full flyer in files section uploaded on 2/28/09.
item.name: Foodshare celebrates Gloria's 25 years of service!
